servinfo.title: Cylinder Head Cover Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Remove ignition coil assemblies from cylinder head cover.
Disconnect PCV valve hose (1) and breather hose (2).
Loosen cylinder head cover bolts in numerical order (“1” – “16”) evenly and gradually.
Remove cylinder head cover with its gasket.
Install new cylinder head cover gasket (1) to cylinder head cover (2) as shown in figure.
Remove oil, old sealant, and dust from sealing surfaces on cylinder head and cover. After cleaning, apply sealant “A” to the designated area in figure.
Install cylinder head cover to cylinder head.

attention3.ptxt: When installing cylinder head cover, use care so that cylinder head cover gasket does not get out of place or fall off.

s1.ptxt: Tighten cylinder head cover bolts according to the following procedure.

s2.ptxt: Tighten cylinder head cover bolts to 3.0 N·m (0.31 kgf-m, 2.5 lbf-ft) in numerical order (“1” – “16”) evenly and gradually.
In the same manner as Step a), retighten them to 5.0 N·m (0.51 kgf-m, 4.0 lbf-ft).
In the same manner as Step a), retighten them to 7.5 N·m (0.76 kgf-m, 5.5 lbf-ft).

torqueitem.t-note: 3.0 N·m → 5.0 N·m → 7.5 N·m (0.31 kgf-m → 0.51 kgf-m → 0.76 kgf-m, 2.5 lbf-ft → 4.0 lbf-ft → 5.5 lbf-ft)

s1.ptxt: Connect PCV valve hose (1) to PCV valve and breather hose (2) to cylinder head cover.
